name: Soccer Games 21: Real Champion
description:
Are you ready for an ultimate live soccer match with a world-famous team in this super hit sports game? Download now and enter the world of superstar sports champions.


Play through all the levels and unlock more. Show off your excellent sports skills in this live soccer game, and get the title of soccer hero. This game will madden you and take you to the heights of a winning streak that you will not be able to leave in-between. Get ready to hustle and win all the matches with the flick of your hand. Aim, and start kicking. Your dream to become the best starts now.


Build your team based on skills that will help you defeat the opponents. Invent new strategies that will help you become a world star at soccer games. Gather your friends and challenge yourselves at being a PRO. Compare your scores to know who is a real master at a sports game. Celebrate your every victory with a team player and be a star.


Strengthen your soccer superstar skills and play against the national teams of your choice. Head with your team to the stadium and guide them to victory. Play this live football sports game, and hit the goal and kick to get points. Pass the ball to friendly players doing the match and set your scores straight by taking an excellent strike with this league match. Stay united and win the match. Become a PRO player through this game that will provide you with realistic gameplay.


This game has three different playing modes, select a model you like and enter the world of an excellent soccer sports game. This 1v1 game will not disappoint you, get your team united and build the strongest national team by scoring a goal.


- Career Mode:
Set your sports career straight with this PRO game. Cross hurdles and reach the goal. Do not come in line with the hurdles or you will lose so BEWARE! Dodge ‘em and win the match.


- Friendly Match:
Play against the popular national teams and take a strike to win and score a goal. Victory is just a flick away. This mode has a victory shot replay, so celebrate it and let the crowd cheer for you. A realistic crowd will keep you motivated to win. Build your dream team to strengthen yourself.


- Penalty Shots:
Take penalty shots to score points and win. Get a closer view of the realistic stadium and cover up your goals through the penalty kicks. These shots will help you set the scores right missed in the actual match.


Customize your player according to your liking. Unlock new jerseys, clothes, and players through coins. Complete levels to earn more coins. Collect daily rewards and get free spins by watching videos. Spinning wheels will add up to your coins so that you can change your player or their kits. Play with national teams and lead your country to victory. This 1v1 game will not let you get bored with its excellent graphics and realistic environment.


Get an on-screen score display during 1v1 matches and try to beat your opponents to make it to the global leaderboard. Bring out your inner sports dream champion and start playing! Stand out from the other players and take control of your soccer career. Your new life starts now. The unique gameplay will help you improve your kick strategy during the match.


Soccer Games 21: Real Champion Game Features:


-Realistic gameplay with awesome stadium shots to keep you interested
-Player customization available to have a more personalized experience
-Goal celebration and the realistic crowd cheering to show you what real victory feels
-Awesome background music with smooth gameplay, to make the game easy to play
-Realistic 3D environment and easy to use UI controls
-Three different playing modes available, pick the one you like and start playing
-On-screen score display and free spins to get rewards and unlock players
-Complete levels to get rewards and unlock more
